name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Theme songs are saved as theme.mp3 in media folders along with metadata in theme.json files. Supports both movies and TV shows. Features a complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload.

versions.changelog: Updated YoutubeExplode to 6.5.6 for latest YouTube API compatibility and improved download reliability. This fixes any remaining cipher manifest issues and ensures long-term YouTube download support.

CRITICAL FIXES: Fixed backdrop overlay staying open (dialogBackdrop), enhanced dialog system detection to use proper Jellyfin dialogs, updated YoutubeExplode to 6.4.2 to fix cipher manifest errors. Action sheets now close completely and YouTube downloads work reliably.

CRITICAL FIX: Fixed API route mismatch and action sheet overlay issues. ThemeSongController route changed from 'Items/{itemId}/ThemeSong' to 'xThemeSong/{itemId}' to match JavaScript calls. Added proper action sheet closing before dialog opens.
Fixed duplicate menu items with WeakSet tracking. Fixed 'require is not defined' errors by using window.require. Menu now appears once without errors. All naming consistent with xThemeSong.
Enhanced MutationObserver to watch both childList AND class attribute changes. Now detects action sheets appearing via class additions and nested elements. Improved logging for debugging.
